entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , New Tecumseth
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:10 AM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Egbert 2:00 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

Humidity: 70 %

Dewpoint: -4.8°C

Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Snow mixed with ice pellets. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow or ice pellets mixed with freezing rain ending late this afternoon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of drizzle. Risk of freezing drizzle late this afternoon. Local snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of drizzle. Low minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of drizzle changing to 60 percent chance of flurries before morning. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening and overnight. Fog patches developing this evening and dissipating before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 3 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 19 January 2023
